name: 刷闪
刷閃
Bench Macro [Shiny Hunt]
desc:
背对长椅使用
推荐按键L+R+A
持续按住快捷键0.5秒开启循环

背對長椅使用
推薦按鍵 L+R+A
持續按住快捷鍵 0.5 秒開啟循環
Position yourself with your back to the bench you've chosen to sit on, as if you were just killing time. Press L+R+A to activate the macro, holding these buttons for one second to start the loop.
macros.author: FuuDigo

name: 返回入口的超空间
返回入口的超空间
Hyperspace back to entrance
desc: 打开地图 > 返回超空间旷野地带入口。用途：反复刷新入口附近的怪物。
打开地图 > 返回超空间旷野地带入口。用途：反复刷新入口附近的怪物。
Opens map > back to hyperspace wild zone entrance. Usage: Respawning mons close to entrance over and over.
macros.author: Eulloyd
